Xianyou Island Park used to be a refinery, but was later converted into a park. Seoul people like the island very much. There are benches, waterfalls, water gardens everywhere. There are also many factories and former offices to visit. Besides, there are greenhouses and other gardening-related buildings.

Xianyou Island Park is a labyrinth-style free park built on an island with a bridge connecting the mainland, a greenhouse and some other recreational facilities, a cafe and a restaurant. It is beautiful to visit in summer and autumn. There are many pavilions, pavilions and water pavilions in it.
It's an unexpected park. It's pleasant to sit in the park for an afternoon.

Xianyou Island Park is located in the small island park of Hanjiang River. It connects with land through bridges. Like Qingxi River, it is a re-treatment of the polluted environment. In fact, there is no fun. There is a coffee shop and a botanical garden and so on. Many old people are fishing in the park.
Very good, very clean ecological paradise, very well protected, we all play very satisfied.

Museum of Korea houses a vast collection of over 420,000 artifacts from ancient times to the modern era in a wide range of topics, including art and culture. The museum houses a Children's Museum, where visitors can learn more about the nation's history through educational programs and experiences.
I didn't know there was such a place ~ It looks fun
The embroidery museum can see many traditional Korean clothes and screens, very gorgeous.

There are not many people coming to this museum, but Grace thinks it's worth visiting. There are many kinds of embroidery in it, from stitching to pattern. It's highly recommended that you come here and have a look.

Besides, I also saw art, embroidery museum, folk legend Museum and so on. My favorite place is the Beicun Museum of Life History. The same Chinese character culture seems to be similar to China in many ways, but also in many different places. Listening to the explanations of things used in ancient times or the way they were used, it's amazing how there could be such an idea.

Only part of the museum is on display. Small single-storey exhibition hall will replace exhibits with different themes every 1.2 months, so that people can experience Korean women's life and culture. Very local ethnic characteristics

Korean Embroidery Museum, the works displayed here are very beautiful and very beautiful, similar to our Chinese embroidery, the museum area is not very large, you can come and have a look when you have time.

It should be said that Korean embroidery is not as good as our Chinese embroidery, but to see Korean embroidery is still very shocking their fine and workmanship, Korean Korean clothing is really beautiful, it is worth learning, we should keep the old traditions and what.

The embroidery museum is quite small in a small museum in the building. Since nobody is locked, please let the administrator at the entrance open it. I have always thought that embroidery is the quintessence of China. Unexpectedly, there are also embroidery museums in South Korea, and there are about 1,000 pieces of Korean-era embroidery in this museum, which is worth visiting.
This is a museum specially designed for embroidery. There are many embroidery costumes. They are very beautiful.

It's a tradition of the Chinese people. We see all kinds of beautiful Korean clothes, screens and so on. The exhibition is very beautiful. In addition, there are trial-wear areas. I felt a sense of antiquity all of a sudden.
